resources.string:
This app requires an Mqtt broker and a Mqtt-enabled Ir-sender. The broker is a software which handles Mqtt-messages in the network. The Ir-sender is a Esp01 connected via Wifi that listens to Mqtt messages with the topic irsender. When messages with this topic arrives it reads the payload and converts it to ir codes. Theese are then sent via the devices ir diode. The app sends codes for LG TV:s via Mqtt to the broker with the subject irsender.
Start by opening the settings.
